com.sun.kvem.midp.io.j2se.wma.client
Interface WMAClient.MessageListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
WMAClient.MessageListenerAdapter
Enclosing class:
WMAClient
public static interface WMAClient.MessageListener

Register a MessageListener with a WMAClient to receive notification when a new message arrives.

See Also:
WMAClient.setMessageListener(com.sun.kvem.midp.io.j2se.wma.client.WMAClient.MessageListener)

Method Summary
 void notifyIncomingMessage(WMAClient client)
          Called when a new message is received by the WMAClient.
 

Method Detail

notifyIncomingMessage

void notifyIncomingMessage(WMAClient client)
Called when a new message is received by the WMAClient.

The listener is only notified when the first segment of a message is received, not for continuation segments.

Notification is received on a separate thread.

Parameters:
client - the WMAClient reporting the message.
